languages.text: {n}Арлекин, перевернут. Ложь, манипуляция, игра теней на моем пути. Но ложь разоблаченная. Обман, которому надлежит быть раскрытым.{/n}
{n}The Harlequin, inverted. Lies, manipulation, a shadow play blocking my path. But it is a lie exposed — a deception that must be revealed.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Арлекин, перевернут. Ложь, манипуляция, игра теней на моем пути. Но ложь разоблаченная. Обман, которому надлежит быть раскрытым.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Harlequin, reversed. Lies, manipulation, a shadow play in my path. But a lie exposed. A deception that must be revealed.{/n}
{n}Harlequin, reversed. Lies, manipulation, a shadow play in my path. But a lie exposed. A deception that must be revealed.{/n}
{n}Harlequin, reversed. Lies, manipulation, a shadow play blocking my path. But it is a lie exposed — a deception that must be revealed.{/n}

{n}The Harlequin, inverted. Lies, manipulation, a shadow play blocking my path. But it is a lie exposed — a deception that must be revealed.{/n}
{n}The Harlequin, inverted. Lies, manipulation, a shadow play blocking my path. But it is a lie exposed — a deception that must be revealed.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Der Harlekin, umgedreht. Lügen, Manipulation, ein Schatten, der meinen Weg blockiert. Aber die Lüge wurde aufgedeckt – die Täuschung muss offenbar werden.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Harlequin, inverted. Lies, manipulation, a shadow play blocking my path. But it is a lie exposed — a deception that must be revealed.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Harlekin, umgedreht. Lügen, Manipulation, ein Schatten, der meinen Weg blockiert. Aber die Lüge wurde aufgedeckt – die Täuschung muss offenbar werden.{/n}

languages.text: {n}El arlequín, invertido. Mentiras, manipulación y una trama en la sombra bloquean mi camino. Pero es una mentira expuesta: un engaño que debe ser revelado.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Harlequin, inverted. Lies, manipulation, a shadow play blocking my path. But it is a lie exposed — a deception that must be revealed.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El arlequín, invertido. Mentiras, manipulación y una trama en la sombra bloquean mi camino. Pero es una mentira expuesta: un engaño que debe ser revelado.{/n}

languages.text: {n}逆さまのハーレクィン。嘘、ごまかし、行く手を阻む影人形。でも、これは暴かれる偽りだわ…明かすべき嘘ね。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Harlequin, inverted. Lies, manipulation, a shadow play blocking my path. But it is a lie exposed — a deception that must be revealed.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}逆さまのハーレクィン。嘘、ごまかし、行く手を阻む影人形。でも、これは暴かれる偽りだわ…明かすべき嘘ね。{/n}

languages.text: {n}逆位小丑。谎言、操纵，光与影的把戏，挡住了我的去路。然而，谎言注定会被揭穿，真相必将大白于天下。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Harlequin, inverted. Lies, manipulation, a shadow play blocking my path. But it is a lie exposed — a deception that must be revealed.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}逆位小丑。谎言、操纵，光与影的把戏，挡住了我的去路。然而，谎言注定会被揭穿，真相必将大白于天下。{/n}

languages.text: {n}L'Arlequin inversé. Mensonge, manipulation. Un théâtre d'ombres me barre la route. Mais c'est un mensonge révélé... une tromperie devant éclater au grand jour.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Harlequin, inverted. Lies, manipulation, a shadow play blocking my path. But it is a lie exposed — a deception that must be revealed.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}L'Arlequin inversé. Mensonge, manipulation. Un théâtre d'ombres me barre la route. Mais c'est un mensonge révélé... une tromperie devant éclater au grand jour.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Arleken... Ters çıkmış. Yalanlar, manipülasyon, yoluma ket vuran bir gölge oyunu... Yine de ifşa olacak bir yalan bu. Ortaya çıkması gereken bir düzenbazlık.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Harlequin, inverted. Lies, manipulation, a shadow play blocking my path. But it is a lie exposed — a deception that must be revealed.{/n}
